name: Simply Business
overview:
Simply Business is the UK’s largest business insurance broker. Launched in 2005, Simply Business provides an online brokerage service delivering policies tailored to individual business requirements.

The online offering is supported by a UK based team of insurance specialists who provide a personal service more traditionally associated with broker relationships.

Simply Business insures over 200,000 small business customers and due to its internal underwriting capability, can cover over 1,000 trade types. The company has built up a wealth of understanding of the issues affecting business and has developed its offering to ensure they can get on with the job, safe in the knowledge that they are covered if the worst should happen.

Simply Business has offices in London and Northampton and employs over 140 people. It has been a Sunday Times Tech Track 100 company for the past three years and was recently named in the Deloitte Technology Fast 500 EMEA. Revenues have grown 44% a year from £4.2 million in 2006, to £12.5 million in 2009.
